alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 8:55AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central St. Tammany Parish, Harrison, Hancock, northwestern Jackson and Pearl River Counties through 1000 AM CST... At 854 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lumberton to near Pearl River. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, Picayune, Bay St. Louis, Poplarville, Diamondhead, Kiln, Lyman, Stennis Space Center, Saucier, Mcneil and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 11 and 43. Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 8 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
